column1: Local Foods////Crunchy chicken sandwich: Average. I am perplexed by the popularity of this sandwich. It is not unpleasant
column2: but I was sorely disappointed with how not particularly crunchy it is (the supposed crunch is from some crushed nuts
column3: which are not all that crunchy). I am also not a fan of provolone cheese
column4: so that may have colored my judgement a bit. The pretzel bun is good
column6: and the slab of rather bland
column7: but juicy chicken breast is generous.
